posts.message:
Hi Geeks,

After the daylight saving time has begun it changed the clock 1hour forward, so I disableÙŠ the auto sync and reset the clock back to the original time as no more daylight saving in Egypt.

But after that everything is messed up regarding time ! facebook msgs timing and upwork jobs timing ... almost Everything.

Have you faced this problem before? if so how u fixed it please ?
